title:
Travel in Complete Serenity
We Handle the Unexpected!
aboutText: Bag&Go is a solution dedicated to the quick and efficient management of travel mishaps. Whether you're dealing with lost luggage, a delayed or canceled flight, our mission is to transform your travel experience by minimizing hassle.
reportIncidentText: Report your travel incident in a few clicks, track the progress of your request in real time, and get our assistance to find solutions or receive compensation. Simplify the management of unexpected events and travel with peace of mind!
fillForm: Quickly fill out our form for lost baggage, delayed or canceled flights.
trackProgress: Track the progress of your claim or request in real-time.
workWithCompanies: We work with companies to obtain compensation.
mapComponentText: Wherever you are, Bag&Go is here to turn your travel mishaps into solutions.
